projects.name: Rizik0
projects.short_description: The famous board game Risk online
projects.description: RiziK0 is a web application that allows users to play the famous board game Risk online. It is a multiplayer game where players have to conquer territories and defeat their opponents. The game is turn-based and it is played in real-time. The application is built with React and Node.js and it uses WebSockets for real-time communication. The game is available on https://rizik0.ovh/.

projects.name: Fantastudy
projects.description: Fantastudy is a website for Fantacalcio fans, it allows users to create their personal listone and to compare it with other users. Try it on https://fantastudy.federicogerardi.ovh/.

projects.name: Trashbot
projects.description: Trashbot is a robot that can clean cities from trash. It uses a camera to detect trash and a robotic arm to pick it up. It can be controlled remotely and it can be used in different scenarios.

projects.name: CanSat Italia
projects.description: CanSat Italia is a competition where teams of students have to build a CanSat, a small satellite that has to perform a mission. The competition is organized by the Italian Space Agency and it is held every year in Italy. I have partecipated at the 2019 edition with my team and we have won the second prize.
